Text:
I believe that this game exists only in English...

If it exists in French thank you for letting it know

WORKED 100%   Thanks!  I love retro gaming in 2K style!

BUT...............

Is it the shoes?  IMO, nope!  It's the hands!?  What am I talking about?  Well, the aspect of the game that allows you to PUSH & BE PUSHED takes a lot from this AWESOME game.  Mainly because the cpu will do it from one end of the court to the other!  It's semi-understandable if someone is about to BOOM SKAKA LAKA on you, but on an inbound pass?

BOOMSHAKALALA!.. IT WORKS!

thnx for the awesome upload! :D
Not working on NTSC Wii, wasabi zero chip, 4.3u, verbatim dvd-r, imgburn 2x speed. I will re-download and try again.

I just Re-downloaded. Uninstalled imgburn, reinstalled imgburn, 100% working on NTSC Wii, Wasabi Zero Chip, 4.3u, Verbatim DVD-R, Burned at 4x and verify.

Thanks SOSteam for the upload.
clean files and it works as always!, thnx uploader! :D
clean files and it works!, thnx uploader! keep it up the awesome work! :D

Works perfectly on my NSTC-U console with Wiikey 2 (running normally through Disc Channel).
Thx!
Thanx for the upload loved this game way back when and still love it now. Appreciated. Will seed.
